Nice speach Lord Unitron, I place my vote on Iron Raptor as leader,
Plintissa will get tons of action with Iron Raptor being leader, plus Iron
Raptor is willing to sacrifice for her team and she's brave and courageous,
Iron Raptor all the way!...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2000 4:57 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (Heh, RgDaN, before me.  That's funny.  I was one of the first members
when
> this RPG originall started.  I remember when you were a little no buddy
who
> couldn't RP in the AOL chatrooms.  I remember you begging to fight me when
I
> ripped out Keyura Max's spark from her chest and kept it in my lair.  I
> remember you continously harrassing me saying: "This is the end of the
road,
> Unitron." and it ticked me off seeing some loser like you quoting someone
> like Rodimus Prime, even if he was a loser.  Hell!  I got AOL back and
people
> still got worried around me!  My base was still around!  Now I don't have
AOL
> again, but I remember you being nothing but a little moder.  You know
what?
> Nothing has really changed.  I really don't want to be rude, but your
> ignorance is just bugging me.  Are you saying you installed the cannon in
the
> Ark?  If that IS what you're saying, that is better.  Still BS, but
better.
> But Tigerhawk was outside.  Now he's inside?  Your posts are unclear.
You're
> a terrible leader.  I'm tired of sitting back and watching the Maximals
lose
> time and time again!  The Alliance was made just to save the Maximals from
> the Predacons!  UNDER YOUR LEADERSHIP!  A new leader is needed.  I hope
> everyone realizes you're unfit.  You'd need a whole crew just to get the
> fusion cannon out of the dang water.  And from what I've heard it's off in
> space.  And putting into the Ark as a weapon?  That just shows how totally
> stupid and retarded (maybe a little redundant) you really are.
>
> Terribly sorry if that offends anyone or if they think I'm a jerk.  But
I'm
> just sick and tired of this crap.  How this idiot became leader of the
> Maximals is beyond me other than "first come first served".  I mean, dang,
> even when BioBuu AKA BioStinger came around a month ago, he would even
make a
> better leader for the Maxis!  All the Maximals do is get attacked!  The
only
> time I've seen them attack is the Newcomer's craft, and that was a
scouting
> mission and they were...ATTACKED.  You'll never win with that fool in
charge.
>  The Alliance and Predacons have to ally with them just to keep them alive
> from fourteen people!  The Newcomers!  The Maximals have over 25!  I think
> the leader reflects on the people he leads.
>
> Once more, sorry if this offensive.  "Flame" me as they call it all you
want,
> but I can't sit back and watch this.  The constant moding.  The constant
> non-understandable e-mails.  The leader of a powerful faction that plays a
> part in the very future of the Universe, shouldn't be a fool who modes.
> Sorry, RgDaN, but that, is just how it is.  And I just have to make that
> clear to EVERYONE.  I say, kick RgDaN out of leadership, put Iron Raptor
in.
> She is actually brave.  She took responsibility for all Maximals who
attacked
> the Oblitercons (nonetheless the circumstances at the time of them
shooting
> first and the others were firing in self defense for a moment of the
fight)
>
>
> Lord Unitron AKA ShawnFett
> KSLawDogg@...
